application_type_full: Approval of details reserved by a condition (discharge)
description: Details required by conditions 5 (Construction Traffic Management Plan), No. 7 (Professional Management of Engineering works) of and 10 (Trees and landscaping) of planning permission ref. PP/24/04668 dated 31st October 2024 (Construction of a new basement level; creation of a new lightwell in rear garden; excavation and extension of front garden lightwell and front bay window by one storey below lower ground floor; removal of timber French doors in front garden lightwell and replacement with a sash window; removal of timber French doors in rear facade and replacement with bi-folding sliding metal doors; internal alterations involving removal of walls and columns in lower ground floor and removal of lower ground floor stair and extension of main staircase to connect ground floor with the lower ground floor and new proposed basement level).
